attributes.action: Defend legal immigration: Keep ILR to 5 years for existing skilled workers
attributes.background: The Labour Government has announced plans to increase the settlement period required for ILR - from 5 to 10 years. This drastic change delays the path to permanent residency for many people who built their lives in the UK. We urge the government to reconsider this proposal and provide clear guidance

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Keep the 5-Year ILR pathway for existing Skilled Worker visa holders
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727360
